mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (usermail, userpw, nick, phoneNo) VALUES (#{usermail},#{userpw},#{nick},#{phoneNo})
mapper.select: SELECT m.usermail usermail, m.userpw userpw, m.nick nick, m.phoneNo phoneNo, m.regdate regdate, m.fileName fileName, a.auth auth FROM member m LEFT JOIN auth a ON m.usermail = a.usermail WHERE m.usermail = #{usermail}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET userpw = #{userpw}, nick = #{nick}, phoneNo = #{phoneNo} WHERE usermail = #{usermail}
mapper.select: SELECT m.usermail usermail, m.nick nick, a.usermail usermail FROM member m LEFT JOIN auth a ON m.usermail = a.usermail WHERE m.nick = #{nick}
